author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39245. Fixes a rare scheduling bug that was observed at the HLT in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/39064 (that was first mitigated in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39201).

#### PR validation:

Tests in #39245 and #39484.
title: [12_5_X] Release dependent modules only after the worker has finished for scheduled modules
